con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date.year == 2016 assert slurperresponse.date.monthValue == 9

def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "LT-4257" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 9 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 0 assert slurperresponse.endTime.hour == 10 assert slurperresponse.endTime.minute == 0

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.size == 1

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent).get(0) assert slurperresponse == null

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse == []
